effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder is Poison-type, restores 1/16 max HP at the end of each turn.  Otherwise, damages the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Poison-type holder recovers 1/16 (6.25%) max HP each turn. Non-Poison-Types take 1/8 (12.5%) max HP damage.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages any other type.
